about_the_game:
Magyarock is an acronym. Magyar means Hungarian and you know the other. :)
Magyarok = Hungarians
Magyarock = Hungarian Rock

Magyarock VR is a drumming rhythm game where you can discover Hungarian metal / rock bands
while you are climbing to the top of the leaderboards.
The tracklist is diverse, maybe you will find your new favorite band while you are playing.

  • 20 unique songs
  • 4 environments
  • compete against others on the leaderboards
  • 4 difficulties for each song
  • custom map support
  • streamer friendly (you can put song infos to the corners, you can choose from different cameras)
  • LIV
  • be the part of our community and make the game better with new ideas

Discord server:

Official tracklist:

Spotify link:
Format: Band Name - Song Name

  • Acid Empire - Never Forgiven

  • Avar - Hetedhét
  • Before We Fall - Healed By Fear
  • Continoom - Elmondatlan
  • EVERFLASH - Álomvilág
  • Five More Minutes - Stone On The Road
  • Glasskey - The Bond
  • Heedless Elegance - The Way Of Every Loss
  • Hope Industries - Hope Industries
  • Mirror - Te Magad
  • No One Inside - Lehelet
  • Pathfinder Records - #WeAreTheVR
  • Perfect Symmetry - Délibáb
  • Phrenesis - Zafír
  • SKYBEAST - Boiler March
  • Stabbed - Other Way
  • The Way We Are - Ice-Floes
  • YOUR LAST STEPS - Minden Mi Egykoron

name: Magyarock VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or bette
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Magyarock VR is a drumming rhythm game where you can discover Hungarian metal / rock bands while you are climbing to the top of the leaderboards. Be part of the community and help make the game better.
